title: Liberty or Lunchtime: The Accidental Adventures of Theo Finch
author: Claude
description: 9-year-old Theo Finch doesn't want to be a Revolutionary War hero. He just wants to go home to Philadelphia and eat his mom's apple pie. But stuck with the army helping his uncle, Theo keeps accidentally stumbling into history's greatest moments. Hide in the wrong boat and cross the Delaware? Check. Catch British spies at Valley Forge? Check. Go on a disastrous midnight ride? ALSO CHECK. The funniest, most reluctant hero the American Revolution ever had.

chapters.title: I Was Just Hiding in That Boat
The Midnight Ride I Didn't Sign Up For
The Pie at the End of the War
